* Diana only smiled as she watched Rion spit a few grains of sand from his 
mouth.*

" I know."

* She shifted a little as Rion got to his feet and ballenced himself, 
watching him carefully and just making sure that he didn't keel over and get 
a beakfull of sand.
Diana chuckled as she realized the Rion looked like some olympic runner 
getting ready ti run for the Gold, which looked sort of funny. But Rion 
could run better she she ever could, he had proved that once when they were 
running to see who would get the last energon popsickle. He had won but was 
nice enough to give her half.
He was so nice sometimes!
Diana jumped to her feet as Rion said to get moving, watching him go off 
towards the SouthWest. She moved off along with him, wondering just what 
sort of wtuff was out there to discover.
She loved adventures!*
